SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationExceptionHandler
Central exception handler used to handle validation and conflict exceptions.
Article
Entity describing an article.
ArticleDao
DAO interface used to access the Article entity.
ArticleEndpoint
Article Endpoint Implementation
ArticleJdbcDao
Implementation of the ArticleDao interface using JDBC.
ArticleService
Service for working with articles.
ArticleServiceImpl
Implementation of the ArticleService
ConflictException
Exception that signals, that data, that came from outside the backend, conflicts with the current state of the system.
Customer
Entity describing a single customerId.
CustomerCreateDto
Dto used to transfer customerId information used for customerId creation.
CustomerDao
DAO used to access the Customer entity.
CustomerDetailDto
Dto used to transfer detailed customerId information.
CustomerEndpoint
Customer Endpoint Implementation
CustomerJdbcDao
Implementation of the CustomerDao interface using JDBC.
CustomerMapper
Mapper used to convert customer entities to DTOs.
CustomerSearchDto
Dto used for search parameters by which to filter customers.
CustomerService
Service for working with customers.
CustomerServiceImpl
Implementation of the CustomerService
CustomerUpdateDto
Dto used to transfer customerId information used for updates.
CustomerValidator
Validator used to validate customer related objects.
DataGeneratorBean
This component is only created, if the profile datagen is active You can activate this profile by adding -Dspring.profiles.active=datagen to your maven command line
ErrorListException
Common super class for exceptions that report a list of errors back to the user, when the given data did not pass a certain kind of checks.
FatalException
Exception used to signal unexpected and unrecoverable errors.
LogConfiguration
Configuration class used to configure the logging behaviour.
LogFilter
ServletFilter to log every request.
NotFoundException
Exception that signals, that whatever resource, that has been tried to access, was not found.
SeprIndividualAssignmentApplication
Entry point for spring boot application
ValidationErrorRestDto
Dto describing a validation error.
ValidationException
Exception that signals, that data, that came from outside the backend, is invalid.
WebConfig
this configuration effectively disables CORS; this is helpful during development but a bad idea in production
